intents.name: Greeting
intents.response: Hello! I'm Mahmoud's portfolio assistant, and I'm excited to help you today! Whether you're exploring my work, interested in collaboration, or just want to learn more about me—I'm here to assist. What brings you here?

intents.name: Collaboration & Hiring
intents.response:
That's wonderful! I'd love to discuss potential collaboration opportunities. Whether you need an AI/ML specialist, full-stack developer, or data analyst, I'm interested in learning more about your project.

Please reach out to me directly:

[mail] Email: elgharib.mahmoud2@gmail.com
[linkedin] LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/mahmoud-el-gharib
[phone] Phone: +212 636-167511

I'm based in Chefchaouen, Morocco and open to remote opportunities worldwide. Let's discuss how I can help bring your vision to life!

intents.name: About Me
intents.response:
I'm Mahmoud EL GHARIB, an AI & Data Science Specialist with a passion for solving complex problems through intelligent solutions. Currently pursuing a Master's in Artificial Intelligence and Data Sciences at FST Tangier, with hands-on experience in full-stack development, machine learning, and data analysis.

What drives me: Building systems that make a real difference. From automating business processes (500K+ monthly emails) to predicting equipment failures with 92% accuracy, I love working on projects that deliver tangible impact.

I'm also a team leader at Rowad Cultural Club, managing events with 200+ participants and 60% engagement improvement.

Would you like to explore my skills, projects, or discuss a potential collaboration?

intents.name: Skills
intents.response:
I'm proficient in a diverse tech stack:

[code] Advanced: Python, C, React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Django, PostgreSQL, Machine Learning, Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, Git, Linux
[lightbulb] Intermediate: JavaScript, TypeScript, C++, FastAPI, Redis, MySQL, Docker, Framer Motion
[settings] Emerging: Adobe Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator), Figma, Canva, Video Editing Tools
[zap] Data & AI: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Data Mining, NLP, Computer Vision, Big Data Analytics
[database] Specializations: Full-Stack Web Development, AI/ML Systems, Data Analysis, Real-time Applications

Recently worked on projects processing 500K+ monthly emails, predictive maintenance with 92% accuracy, and analyzing 50K+ accident records. What type of project are you interested in?

intents.name: Projects
intents.response:
I'm proud of the projects I've delivered:

[arrow] CMH Data Management System (April-June 2025) - Centralized system processing 500K+ monthly emails, 65% task reduction, RBAC + 2FA security for 400+ employees
[arrow] SmartMaint - Predictive Maintenance with 92% accuracy using Random Forest & IoT sensors, reducing downtime by 40%
[arrow] Morocco Road Accidents Analysis - Interactive dashboard analyzing 50K+ records with geospatial visualizations for safety insights
[arrow] Tech Horizon Magazine - Full-stack Laravel application with multi-role system and real-time analytics
[arrow] Energy Consumption Prediction - CART regression model for peak demand forecasting
[arrow] Watchly AI - Your Movie Discovery Companion

Each reflects my commitment to quality and real-world impact. Interested in details about any project or want to discuss something similar?

intents.name: Download CV
intents.response:
You can download my CV directly from the header of this website using the "Curriculum Vitae" button. My CV includes detailed information about my experience, technical skills, projects, certifications, and education.

It's a great way to get a comprehensive overview of my background and qualifications!

intents.response:
I'm here to help! I can provide information about:

[lightbulb] My Background - Learn about who I am and my journey
[zap] Skills & Expertise - Explore my technical capabilities
[briefcase] Projects - Discover the work I'm proud of

Just ask me anything naturally, and I'll do my best to help. What would you like to know?

intents.name: Location
intents.response:
I'm based in Chefchaouen, Morocco—a beautiful city in the north region. However, I'm fully equipped for remote work and collaborate with teams and clients worldwide. Distance is no barrier to great work!

Interested in working together? Let's connect!

intents.name: Goodbye
intents.response: Thank you for chatting with me! I hope you found the information helpful. Feel free to reach out anytime—whether you have more questions, want to collaborate, or just want to discuss tech. Best of luck!
